short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables autoplay of all HTML5 audio and video on all websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disable HTML5 Autoplay 2024


Take control of your browsing experience with "Disable HTML5 Autoplay 2024." This extension allows you to block HTML5 audio and video elements from automatically playing when you visit a website. Whether you're tired of unexpected sounds or simply want a quieter browsing experience, this tool gives you the power to stop autoplay with ease.


Key Features:


Block Autoplay: Prevent HTML5 videos and audio from playing automatically on any site.
Minimalist Design: Simple and clean interface that focuses on functionality.
Lightweight: The extension is designed to be lightweight and efficient, ensuring it won't slow down your browser.


Customizable Settings: Choose to enable or disable the extension with a single click.
Perfect for users who value control over their web experience, "Disable HTML5 Autoplay 2024" is your go-to solution for eliminating autoplaying media from your browsing sessions
